data.title: Atlas Brass Salt and Pepper Mills

data.text:
This Brass Mill is a beautiful kitchen tool suitable for chefs and beginner cooks alike. The handmade grinding mechanism is designed to maximize flavor and aroma, producing a generous amount of pepper with each turn of the handle.

Features adjustable grinding from fine to coarse.

Each mill has a flanged base for stability and a durable metal body and ceramic interior.

Due to the natural brass, these mills will age.

Choose from 3 sizes: 7", 9", 10"
